EmailTemplate.name: VMworld VIP Cocktail Party.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Invitation to Chill: VIP Cocktail Reception with VMTurbo Following VMWorld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We’re excited that you will be joining us for the VIP Cocktail Reception on Monday, July 26, 2013, 6PM at 25 Lusk in San Francisco. It ‘s the perfect location for relaxation after the hustle and bustle of VMWorld.
Don’t forget to cruise by booth #611 and try our surf simulator, enter to win your own trip to paradise, and find out more about how to achieve datacenter control.
In the meantime, to quench your thirst for information about how VMTurbo can optimize your virtualized environment across VMWare and multiple hypervisors, check out this white paper <http://bit.ly/18wIHtR>.
Cheers, VMTurbo Team
-----------------------------------------------------------------
VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception Monday, August 26 6:00 PM-8:00 PM 25 Lusk - 25 Lusk St, San Francisco, CA 94107
